questions.question: Rockwell test utilizes ____ as a measure of hardness.

explanations.a: Load is constant in Rockwell Test for different materials.
explanations.b: Rockwell test utilizes depth of indentation as a measure of hardness. It is done for the constant load. Time is specified.
explanations.d: Time of Loading is constant in Rockwell Test for different materials

questions.question: What is the apex angle of Rockwell cone indentor?

explanations.d: Rockwell hardness testing machine essentially consists of a supporting table for placing the specimen, a hand wheel to raise or lower the supporting table, a Rockwell ball indenter which is a hardened steel ball 1/6'' in diameter,a Rockwell cone indenter which is a diamond cone of 120Â°.
